interface.name: wl_keyrouter

description.summary: an interface to set each focus for each key

interface.description: In tradition, all the keys in a keyboard and a device on which some keys are attached will be sent to focus surface by default. Currently it's possible to set up each focus for each key in a keyboard and a device. Therefore, by setting a key grab for a surface, the owner of the surface will get the key event when it has the key grab for the key.

entry.name: grabbed_already
entry.summary: The key has been grabbed already.

entry.name: no_permission
entry.summary: The wl client has no permission to grab the key.

enum.name: mode
enum.description: This value is used to set a mode for a key grab. With this mode and the order of the surface between surfaces' stack, the compositor will determine the destination client surface.

entry.name: shared
entry.summary: mode to get a key grab with the other client surfaces when the focused client surface gets the key

entry.name: topmost
entry.summary: mode to get a key grab when the client surface is the top most surface

entry.name: overridable_exclusive
entry.summary: mode to get a key grab exclusively, overridably regardless of the order in the surface stack

entry.name: exclusive
entry.summary: mode to get a key grab exclusively regardless of the order in surface stack
